Name: xho-imaamismaaeelng
Author: Imaam Ismaaeel Ngqoyiyana
Source: The Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africe(IDM) , https://www.alqurantranslation.com/

Translations.Text: Kanti nakubantu bakwaThamûd Sathumela umzalwana wabo, uSâlih1. Wathi kubo: “Hini na bantu bakuthi! Nqulani uAllâh, aninathixo wumbi ngaphandle kwaKhe. Yena Wanikhupha emhlabeni Wanizinzisa kwakuwo, ke ngoko celani itarhu kuYe nibuyele kuYe ngenguquko. Inene iNkosi yam Ikufutshane, yaye Iyaphendula.”

Bathi bona: “Hini na Sâlih! Ubuhleli (uphila) phakathi kwethu njengomntu ekunokuthenjelwa ngaye kwada kwayile nto (uyithethayo)! (Ngoku) wena uyasivala ekunquleni oko kwakunqulwa ngoobawo bethu? Ke thina sinentandabuzo kakhulu ngoko usimemela kuko (i-Islam).”

Wathiyena:“Hininabantubakuthi! Ndixelelenike, ukubamna ndinobungqina obucacileyo obuvela eNkosini yam, kananjalo neNceba ifikile kum ivela kuYo, ngubani ongandinceda ngokuchasene noAllâh, xa ndinokungaMthobeli? (Enyanisweni) nina akukho nto nindongezelela yona ngaphandle kwelahleko
Hini na bantu bakuthi! Le mazi yenkamela ka-Allâh ingumqondiso kuni, yiyekeni ke izidlele (ingca) emhlabeni ka-Allâh ningayichukumisi ngobubi, kuba hleze isohlwayo esele sikufuphi sinihlasele.”
Kodwa bayibulala. Wathi ke yena: “Yonwabani emizini yenu iintsuku ezintathu. Esi sisithembiso esingayi kuphikwa.”
Wathi wakufika uMyalelo weThu, Samsindisa uSâlih ndawonye nabo babekholwa kunye naye ngeNceba evela kuThi, (Sabasindisa) nakwihlazo laloo Mini. Inene iNkosi yakho Inamandla, nguSobunganga
Wabafumana ke uSâlih abenzi bobubi, balala waca (befile) emizini yabo
Babangathi azanga baba ngabemi balapho. Ngokungathandabuzekiyo! Inene amaThamûd ala ukukholwa eNkosini yawo. Kude lee ke ngoko ngamaThamûd
